# Themes and Formatting

---

During the day a light theme is automatically enabled and in the evening a dark theme is enabled. This is accomplished with the <a href="https://marketplace.cursorapi.com/items?itemName=LinusU.auto-dark-mode">Auto Dark Mode</a> extension by LinusU. Additionally, minor edits as seen below to the `settings.json` file within VS Code were required:

<div style="text-align: center;">
  <img src="../Images/Notes/meta-themes/edits_settings-dot-json.png" width="400px">
</div>

The second line of code in the image above which is commented out is an example of an alternative dark theme.

</BR>
